gen:link.msg:message: `NetResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de huidige periode) BEHOORT gerapporteerd te worden, omdat `NetResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de voorgaande periode) en `ResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de huidige periode) gerapporteerd worden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set01NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set01NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set02ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set02ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set03NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set03NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de voorgaande periode) BEHOORT gerapporteerd te worden, omdat `NetResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de huidige periode) en `ResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de voorgaande periode) gerapporteerd worden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set01NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set01NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set02ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set02ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set03NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set03NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfNetResultAfterTaxCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfNetResultAfterTaxCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfNetResultAfterTaxDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfNetResultAfterTaxDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` BEHOORT minimaal één keer voor te komen binnen dezelfde context, omdat `ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest` wordt gerapporteerd. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1ExistenceThnExistenceCovU1_ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1ExistenceThnExistenceCovU1_ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ResultAfterTax` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfResultAfterTaxCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfResultAfterTaxCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfResultAfterTaxDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfResultAfterTaxDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ResultBeforeTax` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ResultBeforeTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ResultBeforeTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfResultBeforeTaxCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfResultBeforeTaxCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfResultBeforeTaxDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementPremiumPensionInstitutions_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfResultBeforeTaxDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
